subcategory.name: Tabs
subcategory.description: Tab navigation examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS tabs components to group content into tabbed sections, such as settings pages or resources in different states. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
